items.sentence: Tom told me that he thought that Mary was amused by what was going on.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary didn't know how to speak French.
If you cut off one of its heads, two more will grow back in its place.
No matter how hard you try, you won't be able to finish that in a day.
Japan has undergone a drastic change as a result of industrialization.
You're supposed to take off your shoes when entering a house in Japan.
I'm tutoring Tom in French, and in return he's tutoring me in biology.
Tom got tired of city life and bought a farm. Now, he's enjoying life.
Would you be able to come back here tomorrow at 2:30 in the afternoon?
True to form, my mother freaked out the moment I mentioned I got hurt.
